title: A look at Asian Cuisine Festival at Olympic Park in Beijing
content: A visitor prepares to taste steamed dumplings with juicy stuffings during the Asian Cuisine Festival at the Olympic Park in Beijing, capital of China, May 16, 2019. The week-long Asian Cuisine Festival, as part of the Conference on Dialogue of Asian Civilizations (CDAC), was held in four cities of Beijing, Hangzhou, Chengdu and Guangzhou. (Xinhua/Li He)
